Command of the Abyss.name: Command of the Abyss
Command of the Abyss.fullText:
Umbral Cabalist Attack 11Command of the Abyss

Calling forth lore that bound the powerful demon Kulnoghrim, you rend your foe’s mind and leave it less able to ward off outside influences.

Encounter        Arcane, Implement, Psychic
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Attack: Constitution vs. Will

Hit: 1d6 + Constitution psychic damage, and you stun the target until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 383, page(s) 42.
Command of the Abyss.flavor: Calling forth lore that bound the powerful demon Kulnoghrim, you rend your foe’s mind and leave it less able to ward off outside influences.
Command of the Abyss.onHit: 1d6 + Constitution psychic damage, and you stun the target until the end of your next turn.

Vestige of Kulnoghrim.name: Vestige of Kulnoghrim
Vestige of Kulnoghrim.fullText:
Umbral Cabalist Attack 20Vestige of Kulnoghrim

You don the awesome fury of Kulnoghrim the Terrible, bringing his fiery wrath and madness down on your enemies.

Daily        Arcane, Fire, Implement
Standard Action      Area burst 1 within 10 squares

Target: Each creature in the burst

Attack: Constitution vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d10 fire damage and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).

Miss: Half damage and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

Vestige Pact: You gain access to the vestige of Kulnoghrim.

  Kulnoghrim Pact Boon: One creature within 5 squares or affected by your Warlock’s Curse makes a basic attack against a target of your choice as a free action.

  Eyes of the Vestige Augment: If your eyes of the vestige target doesn’t end its next turn farther from you than it began the turn, it takes fire damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.


Published in Dragon Magazine 383, page(s) 42.
Vestige of Kulnoghrim.flavor: You don the awesome fury of Kulnoghrim the Terrible, bringing his fiery wrath and madness down on your enemies.
Vestige of Kulnoghrim.onHit: 3d10 fire damage and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
Vestige of Kulnoghrim.onMiss: Half damage and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Vestige of Kulnoghrim.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of Kulnoghrim.
Vestige of Kulnoghrim.kulnoghrimPactBoon: One creature within 5 squares or affected by your Warlock’s Curse makes a basic attack against a target of your choice as a free action.
Vestige of Kulnoghrim.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: If your eyes of the vestige target doesn’t end its next turn farther from you than it began the turn, it takes fire damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Clarifying Rebuke.name: Clarifying Rebuke
Clarifying Rebuke.fullText:
Umbral Cabalist Utility 12Clarifying Rebuke

You rally your will, calling upon the secrets of the cabal’s Grand Jailer to stay in control.

Encounter        Arcane
Immediate Interrupt      Personal

Trigger: An effect dominates you, or you are subject to a charm or fear effect that a save can end

Effect: The triggering effect doesn’t affect you. You can place your Warlock’s Curse on the creature that caused the triggering effect, if any.


Published in Dragon Magazine 383, page(s) 42.
Clarifying Rebuke.flavor: You rally your will, calling upon the secrets of the cabal’s Grand Jailer to stay in control.
Clarifying Rebuke.trigger: An effect dominates you, or you are subject to a charm or fear effect that a save can end
Clarifying Rebuke.effect: The triggering effect doesn’t affect you. You can place your Warlock’s Curse on the creature that caused the triggering effect, if any.
